programme.desc: Aja jooksul on inimkond õppinud toite ja jooke kääritama ning hapendama. Pablo uurib, kuidas on India kööki mõjutanud Tiibeti, Birma, Laose ja Vietnami toidukultuur.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Keset pimedat talve on alaskalased silmitsi raskustega ja peavad tegema raskeid otsuseid. Jessie Holmes osaleb teist korda Iditarodil, kuid juba tuttavate toimingute asemel seisavad ees ootamatud väljakutsed. Andy Bassich ja Denise Backer peavad Yukoni jõel jäämüürist läbi murdma.(n)

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Gabriele ja Ludovico alustavad reisi läbi Maroko ning Marrakechi turul määritakse neile pähe hiigelsuur vaip. Nad lahkuvad linnast, et otsida kõrbest kasbah’e ehk iidseid kindluselaadseid külasid ja loodavad leida ka nomaade, kuid nad pole kindlad, kas see õnnestub.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp ümber Islandi
programme.desc: Reisisari, milles kuus Eesti meest otsustavad omal käel tutvuda ebamaise Islandiga. Möödas on esimene päev, mis kulus tutvumisele ja esimestele turismilõksudele, edasi suundutakse Highlandi. Silmipimestavate vaadetega keskmaal ilmnevad esimesed ootamatused rendiautodega. Suplus keset inimtühja kanjonit ja päästev varjualune läheneva tormi eest. Sarja autor Lemo. Tootja Hüperborea Liikuvad Pildid / Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja seitsmendas osas algab suur lõimumine ja kohalike oludega tutvumine. Piilume karjuseelu telgitagustesse ja naudime külalislahkust. Seejärel sõidame Kayseri nimelisse linna ja vaatame ringi kohalikul hiigelsuurel turul. Siis jõuame aga imeilusasse Kapadookiasse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Cathy plaanib grillipidu. Michael ei vasta tema e-kirjaga saadetud kutsele ja Cathy tahab teada põhjust.(n)

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuse suurejoonelisele draamale "Howards End" teeb Margus Saar.(n)

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: Inglise kirjaniku Edward Morgan Fosteri samanimelise romaani alusel valminud tundlik draama (režissöör James Ivory) võitis kolm Oscarit. Suurbritannia ühiskonnas olid 20. sajandi alguskümnenditel vanad klassisuhted veel tugevad, kuid tunda oli saabuvaid muudatusi. Haritud ja kunstihuviline Margaret Schlegel (Emma Thompson) ja ta õde Helen (Helena Bonham Carter) saavad sõpradeks kahe perekonnaga: konservatiivsete vaadetega töösturi Henry Wilcoxi (Anthony Hopkins) ja ta naise Ruthiga (Vanessa Redgrave) ning töölisklassi kuuluva mehe Leonard Basti (Samuel West) ja ta kaasa Jackiga (Niccola Duffet). Kolme perekonna lood põimuvad kokku, sest neid ühendavad kaotused ja ootamatud rõõmud. Puutumata ei jää ka Margaretile pärandatud maamõisa Howards Endi ajalugu.(n)

programme.title: Kaardimaja
programme.desc: Shepherdid avaldavad Claire'ile survet ülemkohtu koosseisu valikul. Doug püüab leida oma teed. Claire peab Jane'iga nõu Süüria teemadel.(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Mikk läheb Nöpsi ebatäpsete juhiste tõttu üksinda kuumaõhupalliga lendama ning Nöps asub teda koos sõpradega jälitama, et Mikku aidata ja ähvardav õhupalliavarii ära hoida.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess saab teada, kas papagoi eest hoolitsemine on kerge või raske töö.(n)

programme.title: Puuonni lood
programme.desc: Lapsed õpivad, et raamatutel võib olla võluvägi.(n)

programme.title: Piip ja Tuut hoiavad Eesti lippu kõrgel
programme.desc: Klounid Piip ja Tuut tutvustavad üht vana ning olulist tähtpäeva.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Oktonaudid on teel Arktikasse ja eksivad hiidsuurte jäämägede vahele. Appi tõttab savi-vaal Boris, kes nad ühest järjekordsest täbarast olukorrast päästab.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Täna on Hannes ihukaitsja, ta peab turvama üht isevärki ulakat tegelast.(n)

programme.title: Lastetuba
programme.desc: Higedepäeva eel on lastetoas Timmmu ja Lennart. Stsenarist Silvia Soro, mängivad Mart Kampus ja Aarne Soro.(n)

programme.title: Peeter Paani uued seiklused
programme.desc: Wendy, Michael, John ja Tiger Lily tahavad korraldada Peeter Paanile maailma parima üllatussünnipäeva ning teha talle selgeks, et täiskasvanuks saamine ei olegi tegelikult nii halb. Kapten Konksu mereröövlid kuulevad aga nende plaane pealt ja püüavad neid nurjata. Üllatuspidu saab rikutud, Peeter on küll sõpradele tänulik, kuid jääb endale kindlaks ja väidab, et ta ei taha kunagi täiskasvanuks saada.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Grete Lõbu.(n)

programme.title: Rännud ehtsate maitsete maal
programme.desc: Aja jooksul on inimkond õppinud toite ja jooke kääritama ning hapendama. Pablo uurib, kuidas on India kööki mõjutanud Tiibeti, Birma, Laose ja Vietnami toidukultuur.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp ümber Islandi
programme.desc: Reisisari, milles kuus Eesti meest otsustavad omal käel tutvuda ebamaise Islandiga. Möödas on esimene päev, mis kulus tutvumisele ja esimestele turismilõksudele, edasi suundutakse Highlandi. Silmipimestavate vaadetega keskmaal ilmnevad esimesed ootamatused rendiautodega. Suplus keset inimtühja kanjonit ja päästev varjualune läheneva tormi eest. Sarja autor Lemo. Tootja Hüperborea Liikuvad Pildid / Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kallis kodu
programme.desc: Uudis Bowerite lahutuse kohta jõuab ajalehtedesse ja Laura häbi saab avalikuks. See mõjutab tema sõprust Tomiga ja arstikabineti tulevikku. Bob on haavatuna haiglas. Pat ja Marek tunnevad küll kergendust, kuid pelgavad toimida oma tunnete järgi. Stan tuleb koju puhkusele, ent hirm invasiooni ees varjutab tema taaskohtumisrõõmu Stephiga. Testamendi lugemisel saab Frances teada, et Peter varjas tema eest suurt saladust.(n)

programme.title: Planeedipäästjad
programme.desc: Planeedi päästmise eesmärgil tõmbame Mart Haberi pere toidulaua veelgi koomale - nüüd tuleb neil leida sobiv söögikraam võimalikult kodu lähedalt. Liisa Pulk sukeldub aga taaskasutuse kirevasse maailma ja teeb seal paar väga olulist avastust. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissöör Märten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.(n)

programme.title: Õnne retsept
programme.desc: Kanada kõnnumaal avastavad neli naist ja BS, et laagri ümbruses liiguvad karud. Edasiminekuks tuleb ehitada parv, millel kõik viis saaksid ööbida. Grupi juhiks nimetatud Millel on raske projekti juhtida. Valitseb segadus, Natalie kukub ja lööb end ära ning minestab. Nüüd ei saa ta teisi aidata. Millel tuleb rahu jalule seada ja luua endale asjadest ülevaade, et naistel õnnestuks oma arengureis lõpule viia.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Vaatame uuesti üle mõned läinud hooaja paremad lõigud. Uurime, mis köhides suust välja tuleb. EMO-s on väike Alice, kes kukkus nina katki.(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Vana maatark kardab tulnukate invasiooni, kui lendtäht väikese kuningriigi maadele kukub.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Eksinud lootskala, kes sööb muda ja puhastab oktonautide gupid, on ikka veel näljane. Kapten peab välja uurima, miks Valgeuim hai neid jahib.(n)

programme.desc: Kaksikud said täna uued kingad - koolikingad. Tipsi ja Tim on neist nii suures vaimustuses, et tahavad kingadega voodissegi minna.(n)

programme.title: Venemaa metsik loodus
programme.desc: Kaugel Venemaa avarustes asub kaks maa embuses asuvat veekogu. Idas voolav Volga viib oma veed Kaspia mere kallasteni, kus targad loomad on leiutanud nutikaid viise petlikus Eedenis ellujäämiseks. Baikali järv on suure osa aastast jääkaane all, sest Siberi talv ei halasta. Siinsetes vetes elab maakera ainus mageveehüljes ja kallastel leidub muidki omapäraseid loomi.(n)

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Sõbrad külastavad Ouarzazates asuvat Atlas Studiose filmistuudiot, kus on vändatud mitmed kõigi aegade tuntuimad filmid. Seejärel jätkatakse teed, aga rendiauto jääb Sahara kõrbes kinni ja mehed peavad öö kõrbes veetma. Nende järgmine sihtpunkt Erg Chigaga ootab, kuid abi ei paista mitte kusagilt.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp ümber Islandi
programme.desc: Eesti lipp on jõudnud oaasi Islandi inimtühjal keskmaal. Õhtul tõusnud torm ei ole vaibunud hommikukski. Kas käepäraste vahenditega autoremont õnnestub? Miks rohelise auto habetunud jõuguliikmed kadedusest siniseks lähevad? Kuidas ikkagi saadakse kõik need 500 000 lammast sügisel kokku? Kivistunud Troll ja eriti ootamatu asukohaga laagriplats. Sarja autor Lemo. Tootja Hüperborea Liikuvad Pildid / Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Toiduvõitleja
Food Fighter: One Woman's Crusade Against Waste
programme.desc: Juhtides Austraalias ürituste korraldamise firmat, pani Ronni Kahn tähele, kui palju toitu iga kord ära visati. Nii otsustaski ta alustada võitlust toiduraiskamise vastu. Ta asutas heategevusorganisatsiooni OzHarvest, mis kogub üle jäänud toidu kokku ja annetab selle vähekindlustatud inimestele. Dokfilmis jälgitakse Ronni Kahni ristisõda kahe aasta jooksul Austraalias, Euroopas ja Lõuna-Aafrikas. Samal ajal on tema isiklikus elus nii valu kui ka rõõmu: ühe minia ootamatule surmale järgneb esimese lapselapse sünd teise poja peres.(n)

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Wendt teeb kõik selleks, et Greta muudaks oma ütlust. Hoolimata Betty Winteri surmast, jätkuvad filmivõtted. Helgal tuleb langetada raske otsus.(n)

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Gräf aitab Rathil Benda toimikuga lähemalt tutuvda. Betty Winteri mõrvas hakatakse kahtlustama tema abikaasat Tristan Rotti. Charlotteni jõuab perekondlik saladus.(n)

programme.title: Rulapark
Los Reyes
programme.desc: Dokfilm Los Reyesest, Santiago kõige vanemast rulapargist, kus võib näha hulkuvaid koeri ja kanepit tõmbavaid tänavapoisse, keda täiskasvanute maailm ühtaegu hirmutab ning ligi tõmbab.(n)

Frances on leinas, ent hukkunud abikaasa pärandit vastu võttes selgub, et mees polnud temaga päris aus. Steph on sõjast naasnud Stani käitumise pärast aina rohkem mures. Brindsleyde perekonda ootavad aga tõeliselt head uudised.(n)

programme.desc: Lars sai teada, et Rahvaühendus Võõraste Vastu on koostanud arhiivi kõigist võõrastest Bekkebakkenis. Nüüd on küsimus, mida sellega ette võtta.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess on õnnetu, et keegi ei aita tal kiike ehitada.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Täna saab Hannesest maailma osavaim salaagent ja tal tuleb takistada ühe kurja diktaatori maailmavallutuslikke plaane.(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Ei kiirustab hommikul salapärasele kohtumisele, mille kohta ta ei taha sõpradele midagi öelda. Kuhu ta ometi ruttab? Ja miks?(n)

programme.title: Karu Karla
programme.desc: Karla on täna külas Silveril, kes ootab kangesti külla onu Joosepit. Aga kui onu tuleb, on ta hoopis teist nägu ja Silverile see ei meeldi.(n)

programme.title: Magus molekul
programme.desc: Kas vahel võib muna hoopis kana õpetada? Ja miks peaks kanadele klassikalist muusikat mängima? Sass läheb maale ja uurib järele. Merle ja Aigar valmistavad köögis ühe rikkaliku hommikusöögi ning seejärel paneb Sass muna lendama! Režissöör Ivan Pavljutškov, toimetaja Helen Saluveer, produtsent Maria Uppin ja tootja Black Plastic Media Productions.(n)

programme.title: Härra Jänes
programme.desc: Väike Põrsas avastab, et hammaste pesemine on päris keerukas tegevus.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Täna õpivad loomad lendama.(n)

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Harveyl on sünnipäev ja ema kingib talle lennu kuumaõhupallil. Mõistagi kutsub Harvey ka Zoe kaasa, kuid Zoel on lennuhirm, mida ta ei julge sõbrale tunnistada. Kui aga Lassie annab märku, et mägedes on torm tulemas, on Zoe sunnitud oma hirmu ületama, et Harvey päästa.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Lars sai teada, et Rahvaühendus Võõraste Vastu on koostanud arhiivi kõigist võõrastest Bekkebakkenis. Nüüd on küsimus, mida sellega ette võtta.(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Ei kiirustab hommikul salapärasele kohtumisele, mille kohta ta ei taha sõpradele midagi öelda. Kuhu ta ometi ruttab? Ja miks?(n)

programme.title: Rännud ehtsate maitsete maal
programme.desc: Pablo on lõpetanud oma rännaku Indias, on aeg kokkuvõtete tegemiseks. Pablo meenutab reisil kogetud põnevamaid maitseid.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley - Rongiga Aasiast Euroopasse
programme.desc: Sarja "Täitsa hullud" staar Joanna Lumley asub 9500 kilomeetri pikkusele teekonnale Hongkongist läbi Pekingi Moskvasse. Hongkongis veetis ta osa oma lapsepõlvest ja saab võrrelda, mis on muutunud. Pekingis kohtub ta naisega, kes väidab, et oli viimase Hiina keisri lemmikkonkubiin. Sealt jätkub teekond mööda Siberi raudteed. Joanna külastab Hiina müüri ja sõidab läbi Gobi kõrbe Mongooliasse.(n)

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Läbi kõrbe reisides satuvad sõbrad pere juurde, kes on juba kümme aastat tsivilisatsioonist eemal elanud. Seejärel külastavad nad Ard-Al-Affali fondi, mis mägikülade elanikke soojade riietega varustab ning lõpuks jõutakse Essaouirasse, mis oleks kena ja rahulik kohake, kui sellel poleks ühte kindlat tunnust.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp ümber Islandi
programme.desc: Eesti mehed on jõudnud väikesesse ja imearmsasse Siglufjördurisse. Seljataha jäävad suured turismimagnetid, Highland, üks surnud auto ja üks poolsurnud masin. Selgub, kui ohtliku autoga me tegelikult teel oleme olnud. Kohtume ookeanide valitsejaga. Kas kirglikud kalamehed saavad käe valgeks? Kuidas kulgeb eluke Eestist pärit Valmaril, kes on Islandil elanud juba 19 aastat. Sarja autor Lemo. Tootja Hüperborea Liikuvad Pildid / Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Sõda
En guerre
programme.desc: R: Stéphane Brizé. Sotsiaalne draama nn väikeste inimeste võitlusest oma koha ja elu eest kapitalistlikus süsteemis. Kui suur, 1100 töötajaga Prantsuse tehas Saksa tööstusgrupiga liitus, lubati tehase töötajatele, et järgmise viie aasta jooksul nende töökohad säilivad. Kaks aastat hiljem otsustavad juhid ettevõtte sulgeda. Protesteerivate töötajate kõneisikuks saab Laurent Amadeo (Vincent Lindon) ja vastasseis viib vältimatute kokkupõrgeteni. Kuldse Palmioksa nominatsioon Cannes´is.(n)

programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: Before hunting down terrorists, Mitch Rapp was an innocent college student and a talented athlete. But after an unexpected set of events, Mitch joins the CIA and is trained to the highest level, thus giving him the ability to fight the deadliest and most dangerous people.

A highly intelligent student wants to enroll in Harvard, but doesn't have the tuition fees. He moves with his friends to Las Vegas, where they us their card counting skills to win large amounts of cash in the casinos of the city.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Believing that his bad luck is the thing standing between him and his dreams, Gerry soon finds a companion in Curtis, a poker player whom Gerry believes is luckier than he is. Together, they team up and set out on a journey to New Orleans for a high-stakes poker game.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Two con men try to resolve the rivalry between them through a bet, by picking a young girl who inherited fifty thousand dollars to be their target. Whoever deceives her and takes the money first, is the winner.(n)

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.(n)

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a Special Forces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.(n)

programme.title: Empire of the Sun
programme.desc: The story of Jamie "Jim" Graham, a young boy who goes from living in a wealthy British family in Shanghai, to becoming a prisoner of war in Lunghua Civilian Assembly Center, a Japanese internment camp, during World War II.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: The Expendables go on a mission presumed to be fairly easy, but it is far from. They face plenty of difficulties that result in a death, which lights a desire for revenge in their hearts from a killer who has enough platinum to change the power structure of the entire world.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) finds himself face to face against Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson) the Expendables co-founder who betrayed him. Now Conrad has become one of the toughest criminals, Barney recruits a new generation for the team to help him eliminate his arch enemy.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: A Mexican drug cartel kingpin speeds off to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his way is a sheriff (Arnold Schwarzenegger) and his inexperienced staff,who try to catch him and bring him to justice.(n)

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Former presidential guard Mike Banning must step up when he finds himself in the White House in the midst of a terrorist attack. Only Banning has the inside knowledge national security forces will need to rescue the President from his kidnappers, and avert an even greater disaster.(n)

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: DC policeman Cale (Channing Tatum) is on a White House tour with his daughter when it is attacked by heavily armed paramilitary invaders. He must save his daughter and the President of the United States, though the odds are stacked against him.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.(n)

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: The film follows the story of the African-American track and field athlete Jesse Owens, who was described as being the fastest man in the world, especially after his success in winning four gold medals in the 1936 Olympic Games that were held in Berlin during the period of the Nazi regime.(n)

programme.title: The English Teacher
programme.desc: An isolated lonely English teacher's life is turned upside down when her ex-student Jason Sherwood returns after failing to become a playwright. She convinces him to produce his own play on her school's theater, while his overbearing father is pressuring him to join law school instead.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: When FBI agent Johnny Utah is sent undercover to infiltrate a gang of bank robbers who are also surfers, his sense of duty gets blurred as he befriends the gang's leader Bodhi and catches feelings for a female surfer called Tyler.(n)

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: (Arthur Bishop), an assassin, decides to put his criminal past behind him and move forward. He gets drawn back to the crime world after his nemesis abducted his girlfriend - Bishop now must execute three assassinations around the world, and make them appear as accidents, to save his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the town of Derry, kids are disappearing one by one, leaving behind bloody traces. Eventually seven kids that are united by their hate to a clown that has affected them all, and the will to kill him, It meet again years later seeking revenge.(n)

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Following the mysterious death of the British Prime Minister, Secret Agent Mike Banning does all he can to stop the planned attack, targeting to assassinate all western world leaders attending the funeral.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: An ambitious writer achieves fame when he pens the next great American novel. His secret? The story isn't his. He soon realizes the cost of his success is much higher than expected when he has to live up to his plagiarism.(n)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: As Buddy, brought up as an elf, comes to realize that he is a human being, not an elf, he embarks on a perilous journey to New York City in order to find his real father.(n)

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In 1930's Paris, orphaned Hugo lives in a crowded train station. He enters a new adventure with Isabelle, in an attempt to solve the mystery his father has left behind regarding an automaton.(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: Albert is a sheep farmer who lacks courage, he loses his beloved girlfriend when he withdraws from a duel. He soon meets another lady, and his bravery and confidence must be put to the test when the lady's spouse, an infamous criminal, demands payback.

programme.title: The Death and Life of Bobby Z
programme.desc: Tim Kearny was spending his prison sentence until a DEA agent offers him a way out. He needs to impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord. The negotiations don't go very well, complicating everybody's calculations.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: When a crime boss threatens to harm his girlfriend, Baby is forced to participate in a heist with a few volatile individuals, which makes the whole thing a recipe for disaster.

programme.title: Doctor Zhivago
programme.desc: During the Russian Revolution, Dr.Yuri Zhivago is torn between his wife and his old sweetheart at a time of turbulent politics and social hardships.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: Danny and his team are pulled back to do another impossible heist to return the money they stole from Las Vegas casino tycoon, Terry Benedict.(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: Albert is a sheep farmer who lacks courage, he loses his beloved girlfriend when he withdraws from a duel. He soon meets another lady, and his bravery and confidence must be put to the test when the lady's spouse, an infamous criminal, demands payback.(n)

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: Native American spirit warrior Tonto (Johnny Depp) recounts the untold stories that made John Reid (Armie Hammer) the man of the law into a legend of justice.(n)

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Using a magic button, Casey Newton (Britt Robertson) enters a mysterious hidden land , taking her on an adventure to meet the isolated inventor Frank Walker (George Clooney) whoho entered it before. Together Casey and Frank travel to this land for the second time.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: Native American spirit warrior Tonto (Johnny Depp) recounts the untold stories that made John Reid (Armie Hammer) the man of the law into a legend of justice.(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The green ogre (Shrek) lives in the swamps alone until one day he finds all the characters of the fairy tales sleeping in his swamps. He goes to Lord (Farquaad) with donkey to make them leave, but (Farquaad) sends him to save Princess (Fiona) who's locked in a castle tower guarded by a dragon.(n)

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Princess Fiona has been turned into an ogre and she and Shrek are married. They head out to meet Fiona's parents, the King and Queen, after a long time away. When they see their daughter, they're shocked, and even though her mother accepts the new situation, her father decides to ask the Fairy Godmother help him get his daughter back.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean is training his gang to prepare for a third robbery, after the casino owner Willie Bank betrays their friend Reuben Tishkoff.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.(n)

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: In this cop comedy, a very unlikable pair is made when the prickly FBI agent Sarah Ashburn has to team up with a crude Boston cop Shannon Mullins to track down a ruthless drug lord.(n)

programme.title: Drive Angry
programme.desc: John Milton is a grieving father who's chasing a demonic cult leader, who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter and wants to offer his granddaughter as a human sacrifice.(n)

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.(n)

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: The 11-year-old Anna Fitzgerald enlists the help of a lawyer to earn medical release from her parents, who want her to donate her kidney to save the life of her elder sister Kate who has leukemia.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.(n)

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: Best-friends-turned-married couple Celeste and Jesse married young. They begin to drift apart as they grow up until Celeste decides that getting a divorce is better for them. Hoping to preserve their friendship, Celeste has second thoughts when Jesse starts getting serious with another woman.(n)

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: A romantic comedy that follows the love stories of a group of people in New York City on New Year's Eve. On said night, love, betrayal, forgiveness, and second chances are put on the table.(n)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Marinette Dupain-Cheng is a shy high-school student who inherited magical ladybug-shaped earrings which gives her powers and transforms her to Ladybug. She learns to deal with new responsibilities and protect the city of Paris from evil.

programme.title: Fresh Beat Band of Spies
programme.desc: A music band, whose members work as undercover spies, solve strange mysteries in their town using their unique talents and the amazing gadgets they have.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun the sheep leads the flock to exciting adventures, causing to turn the farm's peace into chaos, while sheepdog Bitzer and Shaun's pals try to hide his misfortunes from the farmer so he doesn't discover what's happening behind his back.

programme.title: Bunsen Is a Beast
programme.desc: The innocent friendship between the blue monster, Bunsen, and his human friend, Mikey, as the latter is trying to teach the former how to mingle with humans. Are people going to embrace or marginalize him.

programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.(n)

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) faces the consequences of his choices as a superhero and a father; as he struggles to re-balance his domestic life while assuming his responsibilities as Ant-Man. He’s also confronted by Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) and Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) with an urgent new mission.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles are back again to save New York city, when scientist Baxter Stockman is working with Shredder to take over the city using the help of criminals from another dimension. The turtles work with April and Vernon to stop their evil plan.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(n)

programme.title: Rambo 5: Last Blood
programme.desc: John Rambo returns after many years to finish his final mission, seeking revenge on everyone who betrayed him, and a journey of dangers begins in the final chapter of Rambo's adventures.(n)

programme.title: Platoon

programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.(n)

programme.desc: U.S. Marshall Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a convicted murderer from a hospital for the criminally insane that is located on isolated Shutter Island.(n)

programme.desc: Shibu and Akash are two convicts who escape while being taken to jail. As they arrive in a remote village, the villagers mistake them for Roman priests sent to reopen their abandoned church.(n)

Something more terrifying than any of them could have imagined.(n)

programme.title: Abducted
programme.desc: Dane is a military vet who finds himself on the hunt for the people who kidnapped his young daughter after a home invasion. As the authorities investigate the crime, Dane conducts his own investigation in a desperate race against the clock to save his daughter.

programme.title: Killer Competition
programme.desc: High school senior Nicole fudges test grades in order to become valedictorian. But things take a horrifying turn, as some students get murdered, and she becomes the main suspect.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Set after the Avengers' Civil War but before the war with Thanos, Natasha Romanoff goes on a new mission in Russia, which stirs up her past with the KGB, her training by the Red Room, and her journey to becoming the hero known as the Black Widow.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(n)

programme.title: Deadwood: The Movie
programme.desc: As the townspeople gather to celebrate South Dakota's statehood, a clash over land leaves Charlie Utter dead and US Marshall Seth Bullock tries to solve the murder and protect the townspeople from Senator George Hearst.(n)

programme.title: The Sisters Brothers
programme.desc: Gold prospector Hermann Kermit Warm, is being chased from Oregon desert to San Francisco by the infamous assassins Eli and Charlie Sisters. But Eli is starting to have second thoughts about his life of crime.(n)

programme.title: Spiral
programme.desc: In this new chapter in the book of SAW, Detective Zeke Banks and his partner are investigating a series of murders that bear strong similarities to the gruesome crimes carried out by the evil Jigsaw, as Zeke becomes trapped in the killer's sick game.(n)

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: When his son gets kidnapped by a mysterious entity, former special forces agent Niro finds himself embroiled in a dangerous situation, as he must take out three dangerous crime syndicates in order to get his son back.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: The Pom Pom Murders
programme.desc: After Audrey gets chosen to be a cheerleader for a basketball team, she falls for a player called Walter, whose cheerleader ex-girlfriend gets murdered. As Walter gets accused of the murder, Audrey sets out on a dicey mission to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Too Close for Christmas
programme.desc: While spending Christmas with her sister's in-laws, Hayley chances on Paul, who caused her breakup earlier, but soon she realizes there might be more to him than she thought.(n)

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Love and Sunshine
programme.desc: Finding solace for her broken heart in fostering a military dog called Sunshine, Sunshine's presence brings Ally more joy than she bargained for when the dog's military partner returns to claim him, and sparks start to fly between him and Ally.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: Years after she quit skiing competitively, Kat is asked by a young competitive racer to coach her and hone her skills. Little does she know that the professional opportunity will also bring her love in the form of the racer's widowed father, Ty.(n)

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.(n)

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Dora who spent her life exploring jungles with her parents,is facing a new challenge--high school. Along with a group of teens and Boots the monkey,she embarks on an adventure to rescue her parents while trying to unlock the mystery of a lost Incan civilization.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Gretel and Hansel
programme.desc: Desperate to find work to support themselves, siblings Hansel and Gretel stumble upon a remote house in the woods whose owner offers them food and work, only for them to come to realize the terrifying secret that she is hiding.(n)

programme.title: Rapid Eye Movement
programme.desc: A radio DJ is pushed to the brink of madness when he tries to break the 11-day world record to stay awake under the threat of a psychotic caller who will kill him if he falls asleep.(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.(n)

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.(n)

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When landing a job at her idol's restaurant doesn't turn out to be the dream Nikki thought it would, she embarks on a new journey with her idol's executive chef, who was unfairly fired alongside her, to open an eatery and develop new recipes that challenge her celebrity idol's own reign.(n)

programme.title: Beirut Blast: The Story Of Warehouse 12
The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack

programme.title: Carnivàle

On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil 3: Extinction
programme.desc: As her fight against the Umbrella Corporation continues, Alice runs into the other survivors from Raccoon City. Together, they brave the zombie-infested terrain as they fight for survival and to bring down the head of the Umbrella Corporation, Albert Wesker.(n)

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A high school is facing a US$ 48,000 budget deficit and announces cuts to all extra-curricular activities. Scott Voss, a 42 year-old Biology teacher, and former college wrestler, decides to prevent this disaster by raising funds through moonlighting (having a second night job) as a mixed martial arts fighter. This makes him a sensation that rallies the entire school and impresses nurse Bella.(n)

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: A true story for the Oakland baseball coach who used his continuous calculations to analyze the team players and make maximum profit.(n)

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: Spoiled dog Trouble has to learn to live in the real world in all its details as he tries to escape from his former owner's greedy children.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil 3: Extinction
programme.desc: As her fight against the Umbrella Corporation continues, Alice runs into the other survivors from Raccoon City. Together, they brave the zombie-infested terrain as they fight for survival and to bring down the head of the Umbrella Corporation, Albert Wesker.(n)

programme.title: Blowtorch
programme.desc: When her eldest son is killed, the widowed Ann is determined to solve his murder and find out the killer. When the detective assigned to the case does not offer her sufficient answers, she decides to take the investigation into her own hands.(n)

programme.title: The Professor And The Madman
programme.desc: As a part of the efforts to compile the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary, Professor James Murray invited people from all over to send entries to help the dictionary come along. One of the foremost contributors was Dr. William Minor, a convict at an asylum for the criminally insane.(n)

programme.title: Austin Found
programme.desc: Fed up with her mundane life, a woman comes up with a scheme to gain publicity, plotting with her ex-boyfriend and an ex-con to kidnap her 11-year-old daughter.(n)

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: As Aaron and Ryan make preparations for their father's funeral, chaos slowly start to happen when nothing at all goes according to plan. While Aaron and his wife still live in their parents house, Ryan is a successful writer but doesn't help out his brother.(n)

programme.title: The Last Airbender

On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.(n)

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: When she takes on the case of a priest accused of negligent homicide during an exorcism, a lawyer starts to experience weird happenings related to her case, only for her client to warn her that the demon that he failed to exorcise might have set its eyes on her.(n)
